sucked.  go to gamecopyworld.com to get the cracked exe for this, but dear lord.  worse than playing goldeneye for the 64.  so unless you are absolutely obsessed with die hard lore (and dont expect much, the voice actors sound nothing like bruce willis and co.) then get call of duty 1 or something, theres lots better shooters that run on crappy systems.
